examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not remember signed up for a membership and I had no idea you would be charging my bank account or how my information was given to you. I am very scared and confused. I cannot not afford this. Please help me.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, unfortunately, right now I cannot afford Canva Pro, nor do I need the pro services at this time, and I was automatically charged. Is it possible to get this charge refunded? I understand my subscription will also be cancelled. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: The subscription got automatically renewed. I cannot afford it. I am a student. Can I please get a refund? I really cannot afford this.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I believed I had cancelled my subscription to canva as I could not see it in my iTunes account.  This charge has come out of the blue and a fee I simply cannot afford at the moment due to COVID.  I only used Canva once as a trial and decided it was no use for me.  Please refund my account.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had cancelled the subscription as I cannot afford to pay this right now. I was sure I did it but there are so many steps to keep you paying that I must have missed one. Please coukd this be refunded as I have not even used your services for more than a month.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am so sorry, I failed to cancel the trial subscription.  I cannot afford to spend this money right now.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I already cancelled this subscription as I don’t use the app since it doesn’t work properly on my iPad! I can’t afford this please refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had to use canva for my little sisters project and I don’t use this website. I did not receive any warning emails about my free trial ending and I cannot afford to pay for a $119 subscription. I am unemployed and barely scraping by and I can’t afford this. Please refund me ASAP.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can’t afford this and just wanted the free trial to see if I would use it and I don’t ever use Canva. Is there any way that I could get a refund?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I canceled this subscription before it renewed, and I have not used the account since before the date of renewal. I cannot afford a subscription of this price, especially one that I have not used, and I would truly appreciate it if I could be given a refund. Thanks in advance.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I already cancelled my subscription, but it doesn't seem so... Could I please get reimbursed for this next month as I cannot afford it.  Thanks for your understanding during these challenging times... I would really appreciate the refund and hope to use this service again when I can afford to.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Is there any way I can have a refund for this I thought I cancelled my subscription before Christmas but obviously must not have. I can’t afford to pay for your service at the moment

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel my subscription the night before it renewed, but I was having technical issues with either the website, or my internet, I'm not sure which. After about 7 tries, I thought it had finally been processed, but apparently not, as I was charged the next day. 
I cannot afford this subscription, I need this money for groceries. Please refund it as soon as possible, thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not receive notice it was going to be renewed and can not afford a subscription at this time!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My account was charged automatically and I cannot afford this at all. I am willing for the subscription to be cancelled, I was not notified that I will be charged. Refund request reason: Please Please Please can I get a refund I cannot afford this and I dont use canva often. Please can you refund me. I just used free trial and forgot about it. Please refund me my payment. I would appreciate it. Thank you in advance.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>
